valueProps.text: AI-powered Corporate Tax software for UAE businesses.
E-Invoicing ensures FTA-compliance and seamless integration with corporate tax filing.
Zakat calculations designed for KSA compliance.

pains: Failure to update registration documents results in penalties.

facts.text: Tax Star offers AI-powered Corporate Tax software for UAE businesses.
facts.evidence: At its core is our AI-powered Corporate Tax software for UAE businesses.

facts.text: Tax Star provides E-Invoicing that is FTA-compliant.
facts.evidence: E-Invoicing that keeps your invoices FTA-compliant and ensures seamless integration with corporate tax filing.

facts.text: Tax Star offers Zakat calculations for businesses in KSA.
facts.evidence: Zakat calculations built for KSA, designed to align smoothly with your overall compliance reporting.

facts.text: Corporate Tax Calculator helps complete tax returns timely and accurately.
facts.evidence: Complete your tax return timely and accurately.

facts.text: Tax Star provides automated returns and IFRS financial statements.
facts.evidence: Automated returns, IFRS financial statement, and smart reminders with Tax Star.

facts.text: Tax Star offers smart reminders to avoid penalties.
facts.evidence: Tax Star notifies you when they are due on a timely basis.

facts.text: Failure to update registration documents within 20 days results in AED 5,000 penalty.
facts.evidence: Failure to update your registration documents within 20 days of expiry will result in hefty penalties.

facts.text: Tax Star's primary call to action is to book a demo.
Tax Star's compliance toolkit includes Corporate Tax, E-Invoicing, and Zakat.
facts.evidence: Alongside it, E-Invoicing in the UAE and Zakat in KSA complete the toolkit.

facts.text: Tax Star aims to simplify compliance needs.
facts.evidence: Find the right tool to simplify your compliance need today.
